Package cdx.opencdx.logistics.repository

Interface OpenCDXDeviceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OpenCDXDeviceModel>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>
public interface OpenCDXDeviceRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<OpenCDXDeviceModel,org.bson.types.ObjectId>
Repository for persisting Device entities.
